transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Sir wohi sari aapko hello

Executive: Haan hello

Executive: Haan haan ji sir good afternoon main Alok baat kar raha hoon India mart se registration manager kaise hain sir

Customer: Haan theek hai aap kaise hain

Executive: Bas bas sab theek thak hai sir abhi woh concern aaya tha aapka to Ashutosh ji ke sath aapki baat hui hogi

Customer: Haan theek hai

Executive: Achcha isme main ek puchna chahta tha sir isme bahut sare product aise hain jo abhi hum logon ne out of stock mark kar diye yani ki jo services hum log pehle provide kar rahe the

Executive: To woh abhi hum logon ne band kar diya hai ki jaise ye hotel staff recruitment service vagarah mein aap pehle deal kar rahe the sir

Executive: Kitchen staff supplier vagarah jo rehte hain na sir

Customer: Kaunsa staff

Executive: Hotels mein jo staff hota hai na sir hotel mein staff jo hota hai

Customer: Haan kitchen mein jaise staff ho gaya jaise hotel staff bilkul bilkul bilkul sir kitchen staff suppliers karke jo hai na sir

Customer: Haan us tarah ka recruitment services woh abhi hum log kar rahe hain kya

Customer: Haan kar rahe hain na staff suppliers

Executive: To is kitchen staff supplier karke jo hai na ye mapping hum log tandoori Chinese South India North India

Customer: Ji ji ji ji

Executive: Waiter captain management ye sab pura karte hain

Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai to isme jo hai na hum logon ne I think kya hai ki woh by mistake jo hai na sir aapki side se woh as a out of stock mark ho gaya hai woh wali category theek hai to woh hum logon ko dobara se enable karna padega jaise liver services wala ye to aapka main category hai hi hai sir

Customer: Haan

Executive: Housekeeping staff ho gaya theek hai civil constructions ho gaya sir right

Customer: Haan

Executive: To ye wala to main category hai electrical vagarah ke contractor vagarah bhi dete hain kya electrical vagarah mein

Customer: Electrical jaise kisi ko kaam ke liye company mein labour electrician chahiye hota hai usko hi deta hai ji ji ji ji ji sir to woh woh wala to ye wali category jo hai na sir aapko ek bar enable karni padegi abhi aap India mart login kar sakte hain kya abhi aap India mart pe login

Customer: Mobile pe hai na

Executive: Mobile pe aapne login kiya hua hai sir aap ek bar aap ek bar sabse last mein jo hai na settings ka option aata hai sir usme mobile phone mein aap ek bar settings wale section mein jaiye aap ek bar

Customer: Haan setting mein gaya settings mein gaye to waha pe dekhiye upar notification second waha pe ek buylead preferences karke aa raha hoga sir buylead preferences

Customer: Latest buylead

Executive: Nahi nahi settings ke andar jab aap jaoge to ek to PNS code settings ka option aa raha hoga sir waha pe

Customer: PNS settings

Executive: PNS code settings ke barabar mein ek buylead preferences karke aa raha hoga buylead preferences sir aa raha hai kya kuch buylead preferences karke

Customer: Haan haan

Executive: Aa raha hai uske upar aap click kijiye sir

Customer: Haan click kiya

Executive: Haan uske andar jab aap jaoge to waha pe category preferences mein dekhiye ye category aapko dikhegi sir contact labour supplier service manpower solution unskill labour

Executive: Tile flooring services labour contractor dikh raha hai ye category dikh raha hai aapko

Customer: Ji buylead

Executive: Ji to usme click kar raha to nahi aa raha

Customer: Nahi aa raha waha se

Customer: Nahi aa raha

Executive: Aap ek bar dobara ek kaam kijiye aap product wale section mein jaiye aap ek bar products mein

Customer: Yaha se kar raha hu

Executive: Product mein jab jaoge aap to waha pe active 37 dikha raha hoga aur inactive mein 37 dikha raha hoga ek bar

Customer: Woh add product mein jayenge na add product nahi nahi add product mein nahi sir jo total product dikha raha hoga na aapke active product

Customer: Active product kahan dikha raha hai idhar

Executive: Jab aap products ke upar click karenge to aapke total products dikha raha hai sir waha pe sare products

Customer: Add product ka matlab kya hai ki aapko koi naya product add karna hai jo normal waise wale product hai uski main baat kar raha hu

Customer: To abhi kis mein se dekhunga boliye

Executive: Jo normal product aapke total product dale hue hain na sir all products all products mein aap jaiye all products pe jab aap click karenge to waha pe active aur inactive karke do option bane hue aa rahe honge

Customer: Woh kahan jayenge all product kaunsa isme hai boliye

Executive: All products sir products wale section mein jab aap jaoge na niche my products my products dikh raha hai my products aapko

Customer: Pehle hai home lead buylead lead manager add product

Executive: Add product karke aa raha hai manage product aa raha hai manage product

Customer: Lead manager aa raha hai

Executive: Nahi nahi manage product karke aa raha hai jab add product pe aap jate ho uske niche manage product karke aa raha hai nahi aa raha hai sir

Executive: Aisa karta hu ek kaam karta hu sir woh aapke end pe nahi hoga kyuki laptop ya PC vagarah pe hoga main isko apne end pe correct karwa deta hu sir ye category aapne mujhe confirm kara dijiye bas

Executive: Ek to main ye jo aapki ye jo category hai isko jo hai aapne bataya hai mujhe kitchen staff supplier ye wale ko main enable kara deta hu sir theek hai ye wali category theek hai aur aapki labour services aur housekeeping services right

Customer: Haan

Executive: Ye thi civil constructions mein kitna rehta hai sir apna civil construction ki labour aap dete honge ya ghar banane ka woh theka jisko bolte theka vagarah us tarah ka bhi leta hai kya aap

Customer: Nahi nahi nahi labour manpower ka kisi ko

Executive: Agar hai to jaise civil mein chunaai plaster sariya shuttering carpenter ye sab vagarah

Executive: Achcha is tarah ke products vagarah aap kara dete hain sir arrange

Customer: Haan

Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai samajh gaya sir main isko category ko karwa deta hu sir correct theek hai apne end pe hi main Ashutosh ka Ashutosh ka number aa gaya aapke pass nahi aaya sir

Customer: Haan aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya na abhi aap next time se aap usi ko call karna direct isi ke pass aapki company assign hai yahi websites mein aapke change karta hai sir theek hai baki abhi main change kara ke ye update kara deta hu usko concern ko close kar deta hu aapke pass feedback file aayega usko aap ek bar okay kar dena sir theek hai

Customer: Ji aur main apne number bhi aapke sath share kar deta hu main Ashutosh iska manager hi baat kar raha hu sir in future kabhi Ashutosh ke sath aapka contact nahi hota to aap direct mujhe bhi call kar sakte hain aap mera number likh lijiye sir please ek bar

Customer: Haan bolo mera number hai sir 8586

Customer: Haan

Executive: 072

Customer: Haan

Executive: 075

Executive: Theek hai mera naam hai sir Alok Kumar theek hai main yaha pe Ashutosh ji ka manager hu to aapke pass Ashutosh ji ka number bhi aa gaya mera number bhi hai anytime Ashutosh ko aap call kar sakte hain usse nahi baat hoti kisi vajah se nahi connect hota to aap direct mujhe call kijiye turant aapko solution milega sir is theek hai baki isko update kara ke main close kar deta hu sir theek hai sir thank you

Customer: Thank you sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's hotel staff recruitment service is disabled.

- Unable to locate buylead preferences in settings.



Resolution:

- Executive will enable the kitchen staff supplier category.

- Executive shared his contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to approve feedback file.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, category, enable, products
